mapper.select: select jp_sos.sos_seq, jp_sos.sos_time, A.latitude, A.longtitude, A.jp_member.mem_name, A.jp_member.mem_tel, A.jp_member.mem_guardian_tel, A.jp_member.jp_num from jp_sos, ( select jp_location.jp_loc_seq, jp_location.latitude, jp_location.longtitude, jp_member.mem_name, jp_member.mem_tel, jp_member.mem_guardian_tel, jp_member.jp_num from jp_member, jp_location where jp_location.mem_id = jp_member.mem_id) as A where jp_sos.jp_loc_seq = A.jp_loc_seq ;
